inclusion.criterion: Indication for single or dual chamber ICD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is to be transferred to the CCU for catheterization and EPS
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant woman or woman who plan to become pregnant during the trial
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient whose medical situation is not stable
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
